name: .EFA File Extension
summary: Learn about .EFA files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: No known program supports EFA files. If you have access to an ASR keyboard you can play it on there or you can convert it to another format with Chicken Systems Translator.
Chicken Systems Translator can convert EFA files to several formats. For example, Ensoniq Disk Tools can convert EFA files to the following file types:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
